title: Ep. - 297 - THE VOW PART 2: BEHIND THE SCENES OF NXIVM DEAF U ON NETFLIX
description:
Kate talks about the new Netflix series Deaf U, about a tight-knit group of deaf students at Gallaudet University with an unprecedented, unfiltered, and often unexpected look inside the deaf community.

 

Frank Parlato who is featured on The Vow, a nine-part docuseries on HBO following a number of people deeply involved in the self-improvement group NXIVM over the course of several years, returns with answers to your questions. Frank discusses the curriculum of NXIVM’s women’s and men’s groups Society of Protectors (SOP) and JNess, the reason behind the leader’s views on women, and more.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/113157919338245/

Amazon List: http://www.amazon.com/shop/katecaseyca
